channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Asus is set to launch a 2-in-1 convertible rugged laptop for creators with unique dial control, a backlit keyboard, and even a dedicated case
item.description: Asus ProArt GoPro Edition targets creators with a convertible design, AI StoryCube app integration, dial control, a backlit keyboard, and dedicated GPU support.

item.title: Apple escalates its appeal of a $2 billion fine from a UK antitrust lawsuit
item.description: Apple isn't ready to pay a several billion-dollar fine to UK App Store users and is filing an appeal over a major antitrust lawsuit. As first reported by The Guardian, Apple has requested to appeal to the UK's Court of Appeal, which would escalate the case beyond the Competition Appeal Tribunal (CAT). The latest appeal attempt follows an October decision from the CAT, where the court found that Apple engaged in anticompetitive practices by exploiting its dominant market position with the App Store to charge higher fees. The CAT's ruling established a £1.5 billion, or roughly $2 billion, fine,...

item.title: A guide to choosing the right Apple Watch
item.description: The gap between Apple's standard and budget smart watches has never felt smaller.

item.title: In the pantheon of new home appliances, the Roborock F25 Ultra is unequivocally my favorite product of 2025
item.description: The Roborock F25 Ultra doesn't sound glam, but it has transformed my cleaning game.

item.title: 8GB of VRAM could be all you can find in laptop GPUs soon — but is it enough? I tested the MSI Katana 15 HX to find out
item.description: I was left quite surprised at the MSI Katana 15HX B14W's gaming performance, but I'm slightly worried about how long 8GB GPUs will last.

item.title: Attackers Caused So Much Havoc Inside Rainbow Six Siege, Ubisoft Shut Down the Whole Game
item.description: Let's hope there's no lasting damage to the in-game economy.

item.title: Prime Video May Expand ‘Fallout’ With a Reality Show Spinoff
item.description: Do you like the 'Fallout' games or show enough to watch a competition show based on 'Fallout Shelter'?

item.title: You need to read the subversive cosmic horror novella The Ballad of Black Tom
item.description: Things that HP Lovecraft was good at: Creating a mythos. Building atmosphere. Things that HP Lovecraft was bad at: Writing dialog. Creating compelling characters. Not being a racist. As a fan of horror in general, I can't pretend that Lovecraft isn't an important touchstone. But the man's blatant racism is also impossible to ignore, especially […]

item.title: Ubisoft is rolling back Rainbow Six Siege servers after being forced to shut them down
item.description:
Ubisoft has shut down Rainbow Six Siege's servers and is in the process of rolling back the fallout of a widespread breach that left various players with billions of in-game credits, ultra-rare skins of weapons, and banned accounts. As of Sunday afternoon, the status page on Rainbow Six Siege's website still shows "unplanned outage" on all servers across PC, PlayStation and Xbox. Update: Siege and the Marketplace have been intentionally shut down while the team focuses on resolving the issue. https://t.co/7k6Jsa5CiM— Rainbow Six Siege X (@Rainbow6Game) December 27, 2025
The fiasco began Satur...

item.title: The terrible Nintendo controller that helped make VR happen
item.description: The Nintendo Power Glove was not good. It's important that you know that. The Power Glove was ambitious, impressive, even important - one of the very first mainstream devices that let you control a game using your body instead of just your thumbs - but it was not good. In some ways, its not-good-ness is […]

item.title: Pourquoi une planète dans la « zone habitable » n’est pas forcément habitable : les experts nous l'expliquent
item.description: Trouver une planète dans la « zone habitable » d’une étoile est toujours un événement, mais cela ne suffit cependant pas à garantir qu’elle puisse accueillir la vie. De nouveaux travaux montrent en effet que l’habitabilité dépend d’un équilibre bien plus subtil : composition interne, richesse en...

item.title: I’ve reviewed over 50 apps this year and these are my top five
Here are the best free tools for discovering new music online
item.description: Tools like Genius, Chordify, and Moises, allow you to travel through time and around the world with sound This article is republished with permission from Wonder Tools, a newsletter that helps you discover the most useful sites and apps.I love apps like Metronaut and Tomplay, which let me carry a collection of classical (sheet) music on my phone. They also provide piano or orchestral accompaniment for any violin piece I want to play....

item.title: Vous avez besoin d’une souris sans fil pas chère ? La Xiaomi Lite 2 Mouse est à moins de 10€
item.description: La Xiaomi Lite 2 Mouse ne joue pas la carte de la démesure ni des fonctions gadget. Elle va droit au but : déplacer un curseur, cliquer juste, sans bruit ni fioritures. Une souris simple, efficace, presque honnête dans son approche. Et quand le prix tombe à 9,90 euros au lieu de 15 euros sur Amazon, l’essentiel devient aussi une très bonne affaire. ...

item.title: 10 000 mAh et Snapdragon 8 Ultra : Honor arrête la subtilité et ça marche
item.description: Il semblerait que la subtilité ne paie plus. Honor vient de lancer sa nouvelle série WIN en Chine, et les chiffres donnent le vertige. On parle de ventes 10 fois supérieures à la génération précédente. Le secret ? Une fiche technique brutale et une batterie énorme !

item.title: Did the foldable iPhone just get leaked? Seems like it.
item.description: Is this the foldable iPhone rumored to be released in 2026? YouTuber Jon Prosser says it is.
